title: Herbertâ€™s Heroics, Chiefs-Saints Preview, and Week 15 Bets
description:
Sharp and House recap the surprisingly exciting Chargers-Raiders game (1:05), discuss how you should interpret late-line moves (24:45), and break down their favorite matchups of the week, (33:20) including Chiefs-Saints, Bucs-Falcons, Seahawks-Washington, and more.
